Source.Name: fbreader
Source.Description: FBReader is a free (and ad-free) multi-platform ebook reader. Supports popular ebook formats ePub, fb2, mobi, rtf, html, plain text, and a lot of other formats. Provides access to popular network libraries that contain a large set of ebooks. Download books for free or for a fee. Add your own catalog.Highly customizable. Choose colors, fonts, page turning animations, dictionaries, bookmarks, etc. to make reading as convenient as you want.
